About

Why We are Different

AKB Cleaning Co, work closely with reality agents and others within the industry se we understand exactly what you need. Whether it be a simple spring clean to an all out bond clean, we will get your house or rental property right back to the standard that you expect it to be at. With experience in the industry we focus on the things that are most important to you as a home owner, realestate investor, or tenant. This ensures that you get the best possible value for the amount you pay. We don't waste time in bring your home up to speed and thats a pomise.

On top of this all our staff are carefully selected and trained so you know you are in good hands..

Why Choose Us

With great prices, flexible availability, and exceptional quality of work. The real question here is why not choose us? We are confident you won't find a better service at a better price.

What You Get

Our committment to our customers is simple and we promise that what you get will be. The best clean for your house, at a convienient, and at the best standard.

Join The Team

At AKB Cleaning Co we are always looking for hard working employees with an eye for care and detail. If you think you have what it takes get in touch with us through our contact page. Make sure to include your resume, relevant certificates and any previous education and experience.
